ja525:5.2: parissaje → pārisajje ca (bj, s2, s3) | parīsaje (pts1)
ja525:14.4: Tena ahaṃ → tenāhaṃ (bj, s2, s3) | tenamahaṃ (pts1)
ja525:16.3: Yaṃ me kucchipaṭisandhiṃ → maṃ kucchimatiṃ santiṃ (pts1)
ja525:20.3: Kaṃ avajjhaṃ ghātemi → ghātemi km avajjhaṃ (pts1) | taṃ avajjhaṃ ghātemi (mr)
ja525:23.1: Mātucca → mātu ca (bj, s2, s3), rudantyā → rudatyā (pts1)
ja525:25.2: imināttho → ko nu me iminā attho (bj, s2, s3) | ko nu me nattho (pts1)
ja525:28.3: Taṃ te dadāmi sabbampi → taṃ deva te dadāmi sabbampi (bj) | tan te dadāmi sabbaṃ (pts1)
ja525:34.4: Andhabālā → atha bālā (bj, s2, s3, pts1)
ja525:36.2: pubbakamhi ca → pupphakamhi ca (bj, s2, s3) | pupphakamhi (pts1)
ja525:53.1: kho → rājā kho (bj, s2, s3, pts1)
ja525:54.4: Rammaṃ hi → surammañhi (s2, s3, mr), sudassanaṃ → sudassanaṃ nāma (bj)
ja525:55.3: Agacchittha → atha gañchittha (bj, pts1) | atha gacchittha (s2, s3)
